tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1962'
tax_brackets.notes: The values here are an approximation of the 1962 tax system. The rates are the 1954 rates with a 5% rebate applied. This rebate was capped at £50, which is not modelled here. The top rate of 76.5% is from previous years and is assumed to be the maximum rate.

ietc.notes: The 5% tax rebate is modelled in the tax brackets. The £50 cap on the rebate is not modelled.

wff.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. WFF did not exist. The rules for historical family assistance programs are unknown.

ppl.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. Paid Parental Leave scheme of 1962 is unknown.

child_support.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. Child support rules for 1962 is unknown.

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1962'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
